availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Thomas L. Clark (Grant County, KY, broker)

body.p: Grant County, Kentucky, broker. Pendleton County, Kentucky, native. Married Eliza M. Davis in Grant County, Kentucky, on September 12, 1839. Farmer in Grant County in 1850. Owned one enslaved person in Grant County in 1850. Broker in Grant County in 1860. Owned one enslaved person in Grant County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules,
Kentucky, Grant County, p. 357A.
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Grant County, p. 111.

Kentucky Marriage Records, 1783-1965, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Grant County Marriages, 1820-1865, Film #001490815, p. 287 of 742 of microfilm (accessed via Ancestry.com).
